dcterms:description: A collection of gameplay data from a set of Atari games, generated using the OpenAI Gym framework. The dataset is designed to be used as a benchmark for evaluating the performance of reinforcement learning algorithms on Atari games, including classic games such as Pong, Space Invaders, and Pac-Man. It includes preprocessed game frames and associated action and reward data.
dcterms:title: OpenAI Gym Atari games dataset
